metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Percentiles are used in statistics to give you a number that describes the value that a given percent of the values are lower than.
content.html: Percentiles are used in statistics to give you a number that describes the value that a given percent of the values are lower than.

content.text: Let us try to explain it by some examples, using Average_Pulse.
content.html: Let us try to explain it by some examples, using Average_Pulse.

content.text: Task: Find the 10% percentile for Max_Pulse
The following example shows how to do it in Python:
content.html: The following example shows how to do it in Python:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
import numpy as npMax_Pulse= full_health_data["Max_Pulse"]
percentile10 = np.percentile(Max_Pulse, 10)print(percentile10)

content.code:
import numpy as npMax_Pulse= full_health_data["Max_Pulse"]
percentile10 = np.percentile(Max_Pulse, 10)print(percentile10)

syntax_highlighting.text:
import numpy as npMax_Pulse= full_health_data["Max_Pulse"]
percentile10 = np.percentile(Max_Pulse, 10)print(percentile10)

content.code_html:
import numpy as np

Max_Pulse= full_health_data["Max_Pulse"]
percentile10 = np.percentile(Max_Pulse, 10)
print(percentile10)

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
import numpy as npMax_Pulse= full_health_data["Max_Pulse"]
percentile10 = np.percentile(Max_Pulse, 10)print(percentile10)

content.text: The 10% percentile of Max_Pulse is 120. This means that 10% of all the training sessions have a Max_Pulse of 120 or lower.
content.html: The 10% percentile of Max_Pulse is 120. This means that 10% of all the training sessions have a Max_Pulse of 120 or lower.
